tool_description: Makes final moderation decisions by combining analysis results from multiple tools and applying business rules to determine review approval, rejection, or escalation.

review_id.description: Unique identifier for the review being processed

policy_violation_score.description: Policy violation score from Content Policy Checker (0-1)

spam_probability.description: Spam probability from Spam Detection Analyzer (0-1)

authenticity_score.description: Authenticity score from Fake Review Detector (0-1)

inappropriate_content_severity.description: Inappropriate content severity from Language Content Filter (0-1)

user_behavior_risk.description: User behavioral risk score from User Behavior Analyzer (0-1)

duplicate_detected.description: Whether duplicate content was detected by Review Similarity Checker

business_priority.description: Business priority level: standard, high, critical

auto_approve_threshold.description: Threshold below which reviews are auto-approved (0-1)

auto_reject_threshold.description: Threshold above which reviews are auto-rejected (0-1)

require_human_review_categories.description: Categories that always require human review

error_messages: Invalid review ID: Review ID cannot be empty
Invalid score values: All scores must be between 0 and 1
Invalid business priority: Use one of [standard, high, critical]
Invalid threshold values: auto_approve_threshold must be less than auto_reject_threshold
Threshold range error: Both thresholds must be between 0 and 1
usage: Provide review ID and all analysis scores from moderation tools. Set business priority and thresholds to customize decision-making logic and automation levels.

final_decision.description: Final moderation decision: approved, rejected, escalate_human, pending_review

rejection_reasons.description: Reasons for rejection if review was rejected

escalation_priority.description: Priority level if escalated to human review
